title: Senior Product Designer Mobile Applications - Sports Media
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Senior Product Designer Mobile Applications Sports Media Posted/Updated: 10-19-2015 Brief Job Description: This person will work with the Senior Director of Design for Mobile to help define the look and feel of our native apps for phones, tablets, and wearables, on iOS, Android, and Windows devices   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
